I'm going to be going to a party pretty soon, and probably will end 
up spending the night there, so I won't be able to post for the whole 
day (after this series of posts). Sorry for any inconveniance.

::Neody::

Neody nods, walking to the bas. He didn't really know how to fix 
machinery, but he tries to immitate the others anyways.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::The Destrocons/Falcon/Snare:::
> 
> Ramjet: Good. We are in complete agreement.  Now, the first order 
of business 
> is to fix up this base, and make it suitable to live and work in.
> ::Falcon transforms::
> Falcon: Thats alright, you get used to it.
> Ramjet: Destrons!  Cygnar and i have agreed.  I will be leading us 
until 
> Magmatron reutrns.  My first order to all of you, including myself, 
is to fix 
> up this base.
> ::All of my Destrons start working on the base.  While they are 
working, 
> Snare takes the dead bodies and moves them to the side.  he has a 
plan::
